modules.name: Ellie
modules.description: Ellie is hiding on your rack as a blank panel!

modules.name: Note Classifier
modules.description: Classifies the pitch of an incoming note (C, D, etc.) and turns on a different output for each pitch.

modules.name: Polyphonic Repeater
modules.description: Converts a monophonic signal to a polyphonic signal where all channels have the same value. Outputs up to four copies of the polyphonic signal, because I had room for extra ports so why not?

modules.name: LED Matrix
modules.description: A matrix of LED's. X and Y inputs determine the selected pixel, and Brightness input controls the brightness of that pixel.
